projectdescription: Password manager app built using python, including the Cryptography and PyQt5 packages.
Website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Loadout, Character, and Drop Point randomiser for the Video Game, 'Apex Legends'.
Converts Images to a Braille version of the image, where 1 pixel is equal to one character on a 2x4 braille unicode character.
Wordle like game where you have to guess the name of an album from a pixelated album cover.
